page.title: 16FARMING (cont)
page.content:
Most of the farm land around Balcombe is owned by Mr & Mrs Greenwood and is known as Balcombe Estate. Below is a list of ten farms in our area T = tenant farmer; M = farm manager. {FARM OWNER FARMER Kemps Balcombe E. Dutton (T) Bowders Balcombe E. Naish (M) Yew Tree Paddockhurst Fields (M) Northlands Balcombe E. Larwood (T) Great Coopers Balcombe E. Dutton (T) Brantridge Hillman Hillman Westup Balcombe E. Larwood (T) Allen's Argent Not farmed Jarrett's Hickey Not farmed Washland White House F.Not farmed
Many of the farm buildings are either sold off or disused. There are not so many people working on the land as there were ten years ago.
